title: Coordinating family visits and holiday logistics
description: Coordinating family visits and holiday logistics
content:
Scenario: Coordinating family visits and holiday logistics
    Given Kenji returns home for holidays and breaks
    And visit logistics require coordination and resources
    When the family_elohim manages visit planning
    Then it should coordinate schedules across family members
    And it should help plan transportation, meals, and household logistics
    And it should recognize labor involved in maintaining connection across distance
    And it should value family members' work hosting and traveling
    And the system should reduce friction in cross-distance family coordination
    And maintaining family connection should be recognized as work
